channel.title: performance-review on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in performance-review on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: What's New in December 2023
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Before you dive in Dwarves is operated as a 50% company, 50% community. Everything we learn along the way of work, we transform into knowledge and distribute back to our tech community.

item.title: How R&D contributes to Performance Review
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Our organization values the research and development (R&D) efforts of our team members and aims to incorporate these contributions into performance reviews.
